question_text: Find the next number in the series: 2, 5, 10, 17, 26, ?
Look at this series: 7, 10, 8, 11, 9, 12, ... What number should come next?
If 'APPLE' is coded as 'BQQMF', how is 'ORANGE' coded?
In a certain code, 'ROAD' is written as 'URDG'. How is 'SWAN' written in that code?
Pointing to a photograph, a man said, 'I have no brother or sister, but that man's father is my father's son.' Whose photograph was it?
A is B's sister. C is B's mother. D is C's father. E is D's mother. Then, how is A related to D?
Ravi walks 10 km North. Then he turns left and walks 4 km. He again turns left and walks 10 km. How far is he from his starting point?
Statement: All cats are animals. Statement: All tigers are animals. Conclusion: All cats are tigers.
Find the odd one out: Lion, Tiger, Leopard, Cow
Arrange the words in a meaningful order: 1. Police, 2. Punishment, 3. Crime, 4. Judge, 5. Judgment
Find the missing number: 8, 27, 64, ?, 216
If 'WATER' is coded as 'YCVGT', what is 'HKTG' the code for?
P is the brother of Q. R is the mother of Q. S is the father of R. How is S related to P?
A man faces west. He turns 45 degrees clockwise, then another 180 degrees clockwise, then 270 degrees anti-clockwise. Which direction is he facing now?
Statements: 1. All pens are pencils. 2. No pencil is a marker. Conclusions: I. No pen is a marker. II. Some markers are pencils.
Which word does NOT belong with the others?
Find the next term in the series: B2D, E3H, I4L, ?
If '+' means '÷', '−' means '×', '×' means '+', and '÷' means '−', what is the value of 48 + 12 - 3 × 6 ÷ 4?
Deepak is the brother of Ravi. Rekha is the sister of Atul. Ravi is the son of Rekha. How is Deepak related to Rekha?

From his house, Lokesh went 15 km to the North. Then he turned West and covered 10 km. Then he turned South and covered 5 km. Finally, turning to East, he covered 10 km. In which direction is he from his house?
Statements: 1. Some actors are singers. 2. All singers are dancers. Conclusions: I. Some actors are dancers. II. No singer is an actor.
If Z=52 and ACT=48, then BAT will be equal to?
Look at this series: 53, 53, 40, 40, 27, 27, ... What number should come next?
A, B, C, D and E are sitting in a row. A is to the immediate right of B, and E is at the left end. C is on the immediate left of D, and A is between B and D. Who is in the middle?
Find the odd one out: Deck, Quaver, Stern, Bow
Find the next term in the series: 1, 1, 2, 6, 24, ?, 720
In a certain code, 'TRIPPLE' is written as 'SQHOOKD'. How is 'DISPOSE' written in that code?
If M is the sister of Z, Z is the wife of P, and P is the son of A, how is Z related to A?
A river flows west to east and on the way turns left and goes in a semi-circle round a hillock, and then turns left at right angles. In which direction is the river finally flowing?
Statements: 1. All buildings are houses. 2. No house is an apartment. Conclusions: I. No building is an apartment. II. All houses are buildings.
What is the number of triangles in the given figure? (Assume a standard 5-pointed star).
If 'sky' is 'star', 'star' is 'cloud', 'cloud' is 'earth', 'earth' is 'tree', and 'tree' is 'book', where do the birds fly?
A clock is started at noon. By 10 minutes past 5, the hour hand has turned through:
A group of 1200 persons consisting of captains and soldiers is travelling in a train. For every 15 soldiers there is one captain. The number of captains in the group is:
In a row of boys, if A who is 10th from the left and B who is 9th from the right interchange their positions, A becomes 15th from the left. How many boys are there in the row?
Find the next number: 4, 10, ?, 82, 244, 730
In a code, '256' means 'you are good', '637' means 'we are bad', '358' means 'good and bad'. Which digit represents 'and'?
Introducing a man, a woman said, 'His wife is the only daughter of my father.' How is that man related to the woman?
If South-East becomes North, North-East becomes West and so on. What will West become?
Statements: 1. Some papers are pens. 2. All pencils are pens. Conclusions: I. Some pens are pencils. II. Some pens are papers.
If 1st October is Sunday, then 1st November will be:
At what time between 4 and 5 o'clock will the hands of a watch point in opposite directions?
A is 3 years older than B and 3 years younger than C, while B and D are twins. How many years older is C than D?
The day before yesterday was Saturday. What day will it be the day after tomorrow?
If A+B means A is the brother of B; A-B means A is the sister of B; and A x B means A is the father of B. Which of the following means that C is the son of M?
Find the next term: 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
If 'DOCTOR' is written as 'FPEVQT', how can 'LAWYER' be written?
A girl is facing North. She turns 180 degrees in the anti-clockwise direction and then 225 degrees in the clockwise direction. Which direction is she facing now?
Statements: 1. Some kings are queens. 2. All queens are beautiful. Conclusions: I. All kings are beautiful. II. All queens are kings.
Choose the number which is different from others in the group: 27, 64, 125, 144
